00009 MMLmi::MMLmi(MMLDocument *o)
00010         : MMLElement(MML::MI, o) {
00011         // initialize the default values for the attributes
00012         DOMString italic = "italic";
00013         if (!defset[id]) {
00014                 defset[id] = true;
00015                 const MMLAttribute **da = defatt[id];
00016                 using namespace MML;
00017                 MML::createAttribute(MATHVARIANT, italic, id, da);
00018         }
00019         MML::createAttribute(MML::MATHVARIANT, italic, id, att);

00024 bool
00025 MMLmi::validate() {
00026         if (validated) {
00027                 return valid;
00028         }
00029         valid = true;
00030         // an mi element may only contain MMLtext elements
00031         MMLNode *n = first;
00032         while (valid && n) {
00033                 valid &= n->isText();
00034                 if (!valid) {
00035                         errmsg = "An mi element may contain only text and no elements.";
00036                 }
00037                 n = getNext(n);
00038         }
00039         validated = true;
00040         return valid;
00041 }
00042 void
00043 MMLmi::doLayout(MML::Attributes *a) const {
00044         if (!first) return;
00045 
00046         first->layout(a);
00047         first->setX(0);
00048         gui->width = first->getWidth();
00049         gui->ascent = first->getAscent();
00050         gui->descent = first->getDescent();
00051 }
00052 void
00053 MMLmi::doPaint(MML::Attributes *a) const {
00054         if (!first) return;
00055         first->paint(a);
00056 }
